4.eng-name: The Book of Ghusl and Tayammum

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to perform Ghusl from a vessel which was the size of a Faraq [1] and he and I used to perform Ghusl from a single vessel." [1] See No

chapter.ara-name: باب الدَّلِيلِ عَلَى أَنَّ لاَ تَوْقِيتَ فِي الْمَاءِ الَّذِي يُغْتَسَلُ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Evidence That There Is No Set Limit For The Amount Of Water To Be Used For Ghusl
